categories: Category:The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark

nodes.text: "Dooku Captured" is a short story that was published in the anthology The Clone Wars: Stories of Light and Dark, adapting the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episodes "Dooku Captured" and "The Gungan General." It was written by Lou Anders, and published on August 25, 2020 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press. The story will be narrated by Corey Burton.
